panels.title: 노드별 docker operation 실행 에러 rate

targets.expr:
sum(rate(kubelet_docker_operations_duration_seconds_count{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, operation_type)
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_docker_operations_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, operation_type, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

panels.title: 노드별 runtime operation 실행 에러 rate

targets.expr:
sum(rate(kubelet_runtime_operations_duration_seconds_count{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, operation_type)
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_runtime_operations_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, operation_type, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

sum(rate(kubelet_pod_start_duration_seconds_count{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node)
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_pod_start_duration_seconds_bucket[1m]))by(node, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

sum(rate(storage_operation_duration_seconds_count[1m]))by(node, operation_name, volume_plugin)
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

sum(rate(storage_operation_errors_total[1m]))by(node, operation_name, volume_plugin)
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_cgroup_manager_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, operation_type, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_pleg_relist_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubelet_pleg_relist_interval_seconds_bucket{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

panels.description:
3xx(리다이렉션) : 요청 완료를 위해 추가 작업 조치가 필요합니다.
4xx(클라이언트 오류) : 요청의 문법이 잘못되었거나 요청을 처리할 수 없습니다.
5xx(서버 오류) : 서버가 명백히 유효한 요청에 대한 충족을 실패했습니다.
panels.title: 노드별 RPC request rate // CODE : 3xx, 4xx, 5xx

targets.expr:
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics"}[1m])) by (node, verb, le))
* on (node) group_left(node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

label_replace(
    histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubeproxy_sync_proxy_rules_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kube-proxy"}[1m])) by (instance, le)), "node_select", "$1-$2-$3-$4", "instance", "([0-9]*).([0-9]*).([0-9]*).([0-9]*):.*"
)
* on (node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

panels.title: 노드별 kube-proxy Network programming duration rate

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(kubeproxy_network_programming_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kube-proxy"}[1m])) by (instance, le)), "node_select", "$1-$2-$3-$4", "instance", "([0-9]*).([0-9]*).([0-9]*).([0-9]*):.*"
)
* on (node_select)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

panels.title: 노드별 kube-proxy - Kube API request rate // CODE : 2xx

panels.description:
3xx(리다이렉션) : 요청 완료를 위해 추가 작업 조치가 필요합니다.
4xx(클라이언트 오류) : 요청의 문법이 잘못되었거나 요청을 처리할 수 없습니다.
5xx(서버 오류) : 서버가 명백히 유효한 요청에 대한 충족을 실패했습니다.
panels.title: 노드별 kube-proxy - Kube API request rate // CODE : 3xx, 4xx, 5xx

targets.expr:
label_replace(
    histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(rest_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job="kube-proxy"}[1m])) by (instance, verb, le)), "node_select", "$1-$2-$3-$4", "instance", "([0-9]*).([0-9]*).([0-9]*).([0-9]*):.*"
)
* on (node_select) group_left(node)
label_replace( kube_node_info{node=~"$node"}, "node_select", "$1", "node", "ip-(.*).ap(.*)" )

panels.title: 노드별 kube-proxy - Kube API request // SLO 99%
